short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically snaps transcript text into caption, useful for translation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Udemy Caption Locker, makes it easy to translate captions in Udemy courses. If your favorite course doesn't have translated captions but contains transcription, you can use this extension to translate captions automatically.

The steps are simple, 
- Install the extension ( it is enabled automatically, but you can disable it from the extension )
- Open up your favorite Udemy course
- The transcript panel will be opened automatically. If you close it, you must manually re-open it to enable caption locking.
- Translate the whole page using Google Translate, so that the transcript is translated.
- Enjoy translated captions :)
